replies.body: Last game was super intense. I was feeling that Cheif were gonna win it from the start though. {{item:3070}}
pls halp, it didnt work 4 me

If you click on the 'if you play on OCE I really recommend you guys to watch this facebook video, I didnt even know that!" link it only takes you back to this page. Just be hovering my mouse over the writing it is telling me that this is a link to this page. It's just a big waste of time and it doesn't help no one.

It's a scam. If you did click, change your password asap. It's your responsibility to keep the account safe and if you don't do it, the scammer may do something wrong with your account (like posting on the website trying to scam even more people). At that point, we will permaban the account unfortunately.
They look like they have been on league for hours and very drowsy {{item:3348}} {{item:2045}}
Can't wait for the Chiefs to go and lose another international tournament.
this year they will go to msi put oce on the map riot might pay us some nerfs to fizz at last {{champion:105}}
Can't wait for people like you to even try and get into the OPL.
